column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Enjoyed the best deep dish pizza!! The Lou is the best. While they said there was 45 minutes wait
column3: they let us order the pizza ahead of the time and brought the food much more quickly once on the table. The large pizza says it feeds four
column5: it would feed our party of 6 (4 adults and 4 kids) easily. Great experience and not too expensive either.
